label: [NodeDev] NodeDev nodes
info:
::: aim

Development of basic node within Node-RED.

:::


::: requirements

- [development node flow](https://flowhub.org/f/d0506e991d512ace)

:::

::: explanation

This flow creates the NodeDev nodes that make it easier to develop nodes within Node-RED, i.e., Node-RED nodes can be developed in Node-RED.

:::

name: README.md
template:
## Node-RED node development in Node-RED

These nodes support the development of nodes in Node-RED by providing a framework for creating tar-balls which can be submitted to NPMjs.com

But also these nodes allow for local installation of nodes to test within Node-RED. If done correnctly, no restart of Node-RED is required, only reloading of the editor.

name: package.json
npm-tarball.html
npm-tarball.js
package dir structure
func:
msg.contents = [
    { name: 'LICENSE',                        contents: msg.contents.license },
    { name: 'README.md',                      contents: msg.contents.readme_md },
    { name: 'package.json',                   contents: msg.contents.package_json},
    { name: 'nodes/90-npm-tarball.html',      contents: msg.contents.npm_tarball_html},
    { name: 'nodes/90-npm-tarball.js',        contents: msg.contents.npm_tarball_js},
    { name: 'nodes/42-node-red-install.html', contents: msg.contents.node_red_install_html},
    { name: 'nodes/42-node-red-install.js',   contents: msg.contents.node_red_install_js},
    { name: 'nodes/23-pkg-file.html',         contents: msg.contents.pkg_file_html},
    { name: 'nodes/23-pkg-file.js',           contents: msg.contents.pkg_file_js},
    { name: 'nodes/34-node-skeleton.html',    contents: msg.contents.node_skeleton_html },
    { name: 'nodes/34-node-skeleton.js',      contents: msg.contents.node_skeleton_js },
]

return msg;

name: set package details and actions here
node-red-install.html
node-red-install.js
pkg-file.html
pkg-file.js
jsTemplate
htmlTemplate
node-skeleton.html
node-skeleton.js
extract existing .tgz
transform to PkgFile nodes
func:
var allFiles = [];

allFiles.push({
    id: RED.util.generateId(),
    type: "PkgFile",
    name: msg.node.name + ".js",
    filename: "nodes/" + msg.node.name.toLowerCase() + ".js",
    template: msg.jsTemplate,
    syntax: "mustache",
    format: "javascript",
    output: "str",
    x: 100,
    y: 50,
    wires: [
        []
    ]
})

allFiles.push({
    id: RED.util.generateId(),
    type: "PkgFile",
    name: msg.node.name + ".html",
    filename: "nodes/" + msg.node.name.toLowerCase() + ".html",
    template: msg.htmlTemplate,
    syntax: "mustache",
    format: "html",
    output: "str",
    x: 100,
    y: 100,
    wires: [
        []
    ]
})

msg.payload = JSON.stringify(allFiles);

return msg;
